price: 113. Dirán: «Vivimos un día o parte de él[665]. Pregúntales a quienes llevan la cuenta».
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ
footnotes: [665]  Ver la nota de la aleya 104 de la sura 20.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin fasali al-ʿādīna
